Posts.EditableText:
Fantasy game, face the evil sorcerer, release the princess...
Play the same game with a Thief, a Wizard or an Warrior. Each time with somewhat distinct ways to solve the puzzles.

Pure Quest:
[http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ygp-b6uckkmwdbdn5ubs7q/the-castle-of-vourtram](http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ygp-b6uckkmwdbdn5ubs7q/the-castle-of-vourtram)

JS generated from Quest:
[http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ph1vfiq9i0ur7gnybd8pnw/the-castle-of-vourtram-javascript-questjs-version 
](http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/ph1vfiq9i0ur7gnybd8pnw/the-castle-of-vourtram-javascript-questjs-version )

IFComp entry (also JS generated from Quest):
[https://ifcomp.org/ballot#entry-1745](https://ifcomp.org/ballot#entry-1745)

Clues on game. No dead ends (I hope).
Enjoy.
